string.text: Assault Territory for the Military
%s from %s assigned you to lead an assault to clear out any unauthorized individuals.

The commander is concerned about the rising number of incursions into the Zone. He wants you to go in and sweep an area for unauthorized personnel. Mantente alerta para cualquier amistoso, pero cualquier otra persona que veas está autorizada a disparar a la vista.
Gran trabajo. Keep it up you'll be in line for a commendation.
Capture Territory for the Military
You have been ordered by %s from %s to capture territory within the Zone.
A nuestra unidad se le ha encomendado la tarea de seguir adentrándose en la Zona. El comandante está buscando voluntarios para capturar territorio para nosotros. ¿Puedo informarle de su cooperación?
La tarea está hecha? Buen trabajo. I'll inform the commander right away of your success.
Capture Enemy Target for the Military
%s from %s assigned you a hostile target to capture or kill.
HQ tiene una lista de las personas más buscadas en la Zona. Si puede acceder a alguno de ellos, habrá un bono en su próximo cheque de pago. ¿Estás listo para el trabajo? ¡Trabajo sobresaliente!
El comandante estará contento.
Find %s for Military Mechanics
%s are required by Military mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Military mechanic if you find any.
Oye, ¿puedo pedirte un favor? Si está interesado en ayudarme, le diré lo que necesito.

We are in dire need of new tools, since we haven't received enough funds from the Ministry of Defence to procure better equipment. For now, we need a new set of basic tools. You find some, and we will all be grateful. By the way, you don't have to bring it back to me, any military mechanic will do. Do that, and we will all offer you a discount from here on out. Will you do it?
Great! You brought exactly what we've asked. Gracias.
Find %s for Military Mechanics
%s are required by Military mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Military mechanic if you find any.
De acuerdo, si estás preparado, necesito más herramientas. Pero pueden ser un poco más difíciles de encontrar. ¿Puedes hacer esto por mí? Necesito un conjunto de herramientas expertas.
OK, now we need a new set of advanced tools. Bring some back, and we will even offer you a bigger discount.
Regresa en cualquier momento si necesitas que revise tu equipo.
Find %s for Military Mechanics
%s are required by Military mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Military mechanic if you find any.
De acuerdo, si estás preparado, necesito más herramientas. Pero pueden ser un poco más difíciles de encontrar. ¿Puedes hacer esto por mí? Necesito un conjunto de herramientas expertas.
Now we need a new set of expert tools. That should contain everything we need for now. Bring some back, and you will get an even bigger discount from us.
Regresa en cualquier momento si necesitas que revise tu equipo.
Protect Duty Territory
Hostile forces are encroaching on Duty territory. %s from %s has asked you to eliminate the threat.
I have been informed that enemy forces are advancing on one of our camps. I need you to stop them before they get there.
Excelente trabajo. Eres un buen guerrero.
Recuperar el territorio de servicio
Se te ha encomendado recuperar el territorio por deber. Report back to %s in %s after the job is done.
Tengo una misión importante disponible. Freedom has taken over one of our camps and I need a specialist to reclaim it.
La tarea está hecha? Buen trabajo.
Assassinate VIP for Duty
%s from %s has ordered you to find and eliminate a target.

I have a list of VIPs that need...taken care of. Algunos son informantes, miembros de alto rango de la Libertad, líderes de escuadrones, tácticos o simplemente escoria. Extrae información si puedes, de lo contrario mata a primera vista.
¡Estupendo! Nos haces sentir orgullosos Esto es lo que prometí.
Find %s for Duty Mechanics
%s are required by Duty mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Duty mechanic if you find any.
I can really use a good set of tools, stalker...and maybe some money. Si está interesado en ayudarme, le diré lo que estoy buscando.

Most of the repairing tools we have date back to 2006, when the second incident happened. Long before Duty even existed. We had to scavenge what equipment was left from the Military. Long story short, we need a new set of basic tools. Bring it back to any Duty mechanic you encounter and we will offer you a discount. Are you up for the task?
Nice work. We'll give you a good discount for bringing these tools.
Find %s for Duty Mechanics
%s are required by Duty mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Duty mechanic if you find any.
Oye, amigo, si encuentras algunas herramientas más avanzadas, te daré un descuento. ¿Me vigilarás? Necesito un conjunto de herramientas expertas.
Now we need a new set of advanced tools. Bring one set and we will offer you a bigger discount from here on out.
That's great. We'll give you a bigger discount for bringing these tools.
Find %s for Duty Mechanics
%s are required by Duty mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Duty mechanic if you find any.
Oye, amigo, si encuentras algunas herramientas más avanzadas, te daré un descuento. ¿Me vigilarás? Necesito un conjunto de herramientas expertas.
Now we need a new set of expert tools. That should contain everything we need for now. If you can bring some back we will offer you an even bigger discount.
Excellent! Now we have everything we need, thanks a lot stalker. Enjoy your discounts.
Eliminate Target for Bandits
Find and eliminate the target then return to %s from %s for payment.

Hay muchas personas en la Zona que me han frotado de la manera equivocada o me han mostrado falta de respeto. Algunos de estos pinchazos me deben dinero o jodieron algún trato. Estas personas no son más que ratas que necesitan ser eliminadas. Si está listo para la tarea, le daré su información para que pueda rastrearlos a través del GPS.
Great work! Here's a little something for your trouble:
Eliminate Mutant Threat for Bandits

Se han detectado mutantes cerca de este lugar, lo que hace que el área sea peligrosa. Se te ha encomendado la tarea de eliminar la amenaza de los mutantes dentro del área. Report back to %s in %s after the job is done.

We've been looking for someone with enough balls to clear out mutants in a few places. Stalkers aren't coming around here because they are too afraid. If we don't do something about it we won't have anyone left to 'borrow' any goods from, then we will have to move out of this territory.
Aquí está su pago. I'll make sure to put a good word in for you with the boss.
Eliminate Enemy Threat for Bandits
Se te ha encomendado la tarea de eliminar una amenaza territorial dentro del área. Report back to %s in %s after the job is done.
Las perras se están mudando a nuestro territorio. The boss gave me orders to recruit a low life with enough balls to reclaim some of these camps. ¿Qué dices? ¡Fantástico!
Aquí está su pago. I'll make sure to put a good word in for you with the boss.
Chiki-Briki i v Damke
%s from %s tasked you get the upper hand on local stalkers by relieving them of their valuables long enough until your band of merry men are satisfied.

Hay algunos tipos que están buscando a otro para unirse a ellos por un tiempo. Necesitan un explorador para sacarlos en busca de objetivos principales y te pagarán una vez que hayas terminado tu trabajo.
Buena toma, ¿eh? Aquí está tu corte.
Ejecuta un golpe
%s from %s has contracted you to run a hit. Encuentre y elimine el objetivo y luego regrese con él para el pago.
Tengo una lista de personas que me han frotado de la manera equivocada. Quiero que los borres. ¿Qué dices? ¿Qué dices?
Esto es lo que prometí.
Find %s for Bandit Mechanics
%s are required by Bandit mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Bandit mechanic if you find any.
I'm in desperate need of new tools, man. I can't do anything with the rusty shit I have and I'm running out of gun oil. Si está interesado en ayudarme, le diré lo que necesito.

We need better tools, yo. It's pretty fucking hard to search for them when every motherfucker in the Zone is shooting us on sight. For now, we just need a new set of basic tools. You find one, bring it back to any of our mechanics and we will even offer you a discount from here on out. You up for it, dude?
Perfect! This is just what we need, man. I will talk to the other mechanics to give you a discount.
Find %s for Bandit Mechanics
%s are required by Bandit mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Bandit mechanic if you find any.
The toolkit you brought me is great, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
Now we need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, we need it.
Buen trato, amigo, aquí hay algo de dinero. I spoke to the other mechanics to give you an even bigger discount.
Find %s for Bandit Mechanics
%s are required by Bandit mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Bandit mechanic if you find any.
The toolkit you brought me is great, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
Now we need an %s. That should contain everything we need for now. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, we need it.
You followed through again! Good deal, man, now we have everything we need. We'll give you another discount for your work.
Contract Killer
Usted ha sido contratado para encontrar y eliminar un objetivo. Return to %s in %s for payment when the task is complete.

Nuestro contratista tiene una lista de recompensas sobresalientes. Necesitamos voluntarios para llevar a cabo estos éxitos discretamente, lo que nos permitirá cumplir con nuestras obligaciones para con nuestro contratista. ¿Estás interesado?
¿Se hace? Estupendo. Here is your percentage:
Assault Territory for the Mercenaries
Despeje el área de cualquier y todas las amenazas hostiles. Return to %s in %s for payment when the task is complete.
Necesito que seas el hombre del punto en un asalto. Despeja el área objetivo de todas y cada una de las fuerzas hostiles.
Excelente trabajo. Eres un buen guerrero.
Find %s for Mercenary Mechanics
%s are required by Mercenary mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Mercenary mechanic if you find any.
Tengo una propuesta para ti. Si puede traerme algunas herramientas nuevas, recibirá un pago. ¿Estás preparado para eso?

¡Bueno! We've been looking all over for a %s. It should contain some oil and tools that we need to do work on firearms. We will pay you for one of these toolkits if you can bring a full set back to any of our mechanics, including me. For every new set of tools you bring, we will reduce the prices for our services as a token of our gratitude. So, what do you say? You gonna help us?.
Tocar el asunto exacto. This is what we've been looking for, thanks!
Find %s for Mercenary Mechanics
%s are required by Mercenary mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Mercenary mechanic if you find any.
Tengo otra proposición. The toolkit you brought me is working out good, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
Now we need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, we need it.
Todo lo que necesito está aquí. Gracias.
Find %s for Mercenary Mechanics
%s are required by Mercenary mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Mercenary mechanic if you find any.
Tengo otra proposición. The toolkit you brought me is working out good, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
Now we need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, we need it.
Todo lo que necesito está aquí. Gracias.
Clear Area of Mutants for Loners
Los mutantes están en pie. Caza hacia abajo y despeja el área. Afterwards, return to %s in %s for your reward.
Shh... Listen, hear that? Escucha, escucha eso? Algunos mutantes aullando. Todavía me da escalofríos después de todo este tiempo. ¿Qué tal si sales y cuidas de ellos? I'll make it worth your while.
Well done stalker!
Find the "%s" Artefact for Loner Trader
%s from %s wants you to find the %s artefact for him.
I usually don't buy artefacts from stalkers, but there is one in particular I would like to get my hands on. Estoy buscando el %s. ¿Alguna vez has visto uno?
I'm looking for the "%s" artefact. You ever seen one? I usually don't buy artefacts from stalkers, but I would like to get my hands on this one. Buena caza stalker!
Good hunting stalker!
My Brother's Keeper
%s from %s wants you to kill a stalker who defected to the Military.

There's a guy; used to be a regular stalker just like anyone else around here. One day, some Military officers came and offered him a commission. The next thing we knew, he's found murdering his former brothers in cold blood! We cannot stand for that! Find this traitor and avenge the men he shot in the back.
Ah, you killed him? I think I'm gonna help myself to a drink. I'm sure we could all do with one...
Eliminate Mutant Threat for Loners

Se han detectado mutantes cerca de esta ubicación, lo que hace que el área sea peligrosa para algunos lugareños. Se te ha encomendado la tarea de eliminar la amenaza de los mutantes dentro del área. Report back to %s in %s after the job is done.
I've been looking for someone to help keep the area around here a bit safer by depopulating the various mutant lairs found in area. Would you like the job?
Gracias, stalker. El área será mucho más segura para los demás por su culpa. Aquí está tu pago.
High Threat Assassination
%s from %s has a high value target that needs to be eliminated.
I have a dangerous threat that needs to be eliminated He will not be easy to get to but I promise to pay you well. ¡Trabajo sobresaliente!
Excelente stalker de trabajo. Aquí está tu pago.
Find %s for Loner Trader
%s from %s is looking for a specific firearm in moderate condition. Regresa a él si encuentras uno.
One of my trappers is in the market for a specific firearm that I don't have available. Would you be able to track one down for me?
I need a %s. The trapper who wants it needs it to be at least in moderate condition. Puedo pagarte bien si encuentras uno.
Ah, perfecto. Esto hará muy bien. Aquí está el dinero que te prometí.
Collect %s for Loner Trader
%s from %s says he will pay well if I can bring him a %s.
Tengo una recompensa por un tipo particular de mutante. ¿Estás interesado?
Mata a este mutante y tráeme su %s y te pagaré bien, stalker.
Ah, otra amenaza eliminada y una nueva decoración para el campamento. Bien hecho, stalker.
Find %s for Loner Mechanics
%s are required by Loner mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Loner mechanic if you find any.
Necesito nuevas herramientas, stalker, algo que es difícil de encontrar en la Zona. If you are interested in helping us out, I will tell you what we need.

Glad you asked, we would really like some new tools to works with, something that is very hard to come by in the Zone. For the beginning, find a new set of basic tools. Then, bring it back to any Loner mechanic and we will offer you a discount from here on out. Are you up for it?

Perfect! This is just what we need, stalker. If you need any of your equipment fine-tuned, don't hesitate to ask me to take a look at it. I will also inform the other mechanics to give you a discount.
Find %s for Loner Mechanics
%s are required by Loner mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Loner mechanic if you find any.
The toolkit you brought me is great, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
Now we need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, bring it.
Whoa! You found quite a nice set of tools. Here's some money in return. I will talk to the other mechanics to give you a better discount.
Find %s for Loner Mechanics
%s are required by Loner mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Loner mechanic if you find any.
The toolkit you brought me is great, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
We need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, bring it.
Nice! You found a very nice set of tools. Here's some money for your trouble. I also spoke with the other mechanics to give you a better discount.
Entregar PDA a Nimble
%s from %s needs you to deliver an encrypted PDA to Nimble in Zaton.
I want you to deliver this encrypted PDA to Nimble. Make sure you don't drop it or break it, okay?
Destroy a Military Helicopter for Clear Sky
%s from %s wants you to destroy a military attack helicopter.

The army has always been an annoyance to us, sending raiding parties to our outposts and such. But recently, they've been striking at us from above. See where I'm getting at? I want you to destroy one of their attack helicopters, that should make a dent in their forces. Think you could manage this? The reward will be good.
Escort the Scientists for Clear Sky %s

%s from %s has hired you to guide some scientists to a specific location for study. Una vez que su investigación se haya realizado con éxito, devuélvalos de forma segura al campamento; donde serás compensado

Los científicos aquí en el campamento necesitan un stalker experimentado para llevarlos al campo de estudio. ¿Estás preparado para eso? Tu trabajo es mantenerlos vivos y guiarlos a su destino. El fracaso le dará una mala reputación por aquí.
Gracias, stalker. Puede tener esto como pago por sus servicios.
Eliminate Mutant Threat for Clear Sky

Se han detectado mutantes cerca de esta ubicación, lo que hace que el área sea peligrosa para algunos lugareños. Se te ha encomendado la tarea de eliminar la amenaza de los mutantes dentro del área. Report back to %s in %s after the job is done.
¿Eres un ávido cazador? We've been looking for someone to keep this place a bit safer by clearing out mutants in areas that our faction frequents. Would you like the job?
Aquí está su pago. I'll make sure to pass the word around that it's somewhat safe around here once again. Gracias, stalker.
Eliminate Bandit Camp for Clear Sky
Se te ha encomendado la tarea de eliminar la amenaza de bandidos dentro del área. Report back to %s in %s after the job is done.

Tenemos un gran problema con los bandidos en el área. Esos matones asesinos han estado emboscando nuestros campamentos fuera de la base principal tratando de tomar el territorio. It will deny us passage through many safe routes through this area; as long as they are in the vicinity. We need an experienced stalker who is not afraid to get his hands dirty. ¡Fantástico!
Aquí está su pago. I'll make sure to pass the word around that it's safe there once again. Gracias, stalker.
Wild Game Meat
%s from %s wants you to field dress freshly dead mutants and deliver %s.
Si eres bueno con un rifle y no le temes a unos pocos mutantes, entonces tengo un trabajo para ti. ¿Estás interesado?

Rations are running low and I need to keep everyone in camp's bellies full. Algunos de los tipos me traen una o dos muertes de vez en cuando. But it's been slow lately - So if you aren't too busy and you are out and about, I need %s. I have my men who kill and process the meat, right here in this base. Tenga en cuenta que hacer que los mutantes se irriten hace que la carne sea más dura por la adrenalina. Además, cuanto menor sea el sangrado, mejor será la carne. Entonces, solo ten cuidado con tus disparos, ¿de acuerdo?
¡Genial, eres un buen cazador después de todo! Tengo pago por ti.
Eliminate Military Camp for Clear Sky
You have been tasked to eliminate the military threat within the area. Report back to %s in %s after the job is done.

We have a big problem with the military in the area. Those soldiers have been ambushing our camps outside the main base trying to take the territory over. It will deny us passage through many safe routes through this area; as long as they are in the vicinity. We need an experienced stalker who is not afraid to get his hands dirty. ¡Fantástico!
Aquí está su pago. I'll make sure to pass the word around that it's safe there once again. Gracias, stalker.
Find %s for Clear Sky Mechanics
%s are required by Clear Sky mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Clear Sky mechanic if you find any.

It's really hard to come by tools here in the Zone. It would make repairing and performing upgrades much easier and efficient for us if we could get our hands on some new tools. The task is for you to bring any box of tools you come across to any Clear Sky mechanics. Si está interesado, le diré lo que necesitamos. Are you up for this?

It's really hard to come by tools here in the Zone. It would make repairing and performing upgrades much easier and efficient for us if we could get our hands on some new tools. The task is for you to bring any box of tools you come across to any Clear Sky mechanics. A basic set of tools is what we currently need. Are you up for this?
¡Hombre maravilloso! Aquí, déjame arrojarte algo de dinero. I also contacted the other mechanics to give you a discount.
Find %s for Clear Sky Mechanics
%s are required by Clear Sky mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Clear Sky mechanic if you find any.
Realmente podría usar más herramientas. Me trajiste una buena mierda la última vez, pero necesito un set de mayor calidad. Si estás interesado, te diré lo que necesito.
Now we need a new set of advanced tools. You bring one, and we will offer you a bigger discount from here on out.
Awesome, man! You came through for us once again! Here, let me throw some money at you. The other mechanics will also offer you better prices.
Find %s for Clear Sky Mechanics
%s are required by Clear Sky mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Clear Sky mechanic if you find any.
Realmente podría usar más herramientas. Me trajiste una buena mierda la última vez, pero necesito un set de mayor calidad. Si estás interesado, te diré lo que necesito.
Now we need a new set of expert tools. That should be everything we need for now. You bring one, and we will offer you an even bigger discount from here on out.
Awesome, man! You came through for us once again! Here, let me throw some money at you. The other mechanics will also offer you better prices.
Yeah, I've been waiting for this. Gracias. Here's your payment:
Repel Assault for Freedom
Intercept the assault squad closing in on a Freedom camp. Report back to %s in %s once you have cleared the area.
Forces hostile to Freedom are moving in on one of our camps. Necesito a alguien capaz de repeler la incursión. ¿Eres el hombre para el trabajo?
La tarea está hecha? ¡Bueno!
Recuperar el territorio de Libertad
You have been tasked to defend a faction territory. Report back to %s in %s after the job is done.
Tengo una misión importante si estás dispuesto. Deber se ha apoderado de uno de nuestros campamentos y necesito un infiltrado para reclamarlo.
Excelente. Bien hecho.
Assassinate Monolith Member for Freedom
%s from %s has tasked you with finding and eliminating a member of Monolith.

I have a very dangerous mission. I've asked for volunteers but so far no one has stepped forward. Las fuerzas monolíticas siguen rompiendo nuestro bloqueo. Quiero llevar la lucha a ellos por una vez. I need someone to enter their territory and take out a certain member of their faction to send them a message. ¿Qué opinas? Are you the biggest daredevil in this camp?
Ah, you survived! Man, you've got a set on you. Gran trabajo.
Assassinate Target for Freedom
%s from %s has tasked you with finding and eliminating a target.
Hay un cierto individuo que ha sido muy ruidoso en su oposición a la Libertad y necesita ser aquietado. ¿Eres bueno para callar a la gente?
¡Estupendo! Nos haces sentir orgullosos Esto es lo que prometí:
Find %s for Freedom
%s from %s has asked you to find a specific firearm. Vuelve cuando encuentres lo que está buscando.
With Duty to the south of us and Monolith to the north, we are cut off. Nuestro armamento se está agotando y necesitamos reemplazos. ¿Alguna vez has hecho funcionar algún arma?
We could really use a new %s. If you can find us one in moderate condition I would be willing to pay a good price for it.
Bien hecho. Esto contribuirá en gran medida a ayudarnos a defender la Zona. Aquí está el pago que prometí.
Wild Game Meat
%s from %s wants you to field dress freshly dead mutants to collect %s.
Tengo el trabajo para ti, hombre, si no le temes a unos pocos mutantes. ¿Estás interesado?

Algunos de los tipos me traen una o dos muertes de vez en cuando. But it's been slow lately - So if you aren't too busy and you are out and about, I need %s. Our cook kills and processes the meat, right here in this camp.
¡Genial, eres un buen cazador! Tengo pago por ti.
Clear Area of Mutants for Freedom
Hunt these mutants down and clear the area.
I'd like someone to eliminate the mutants at this location, they've been causing trouble to our guys. I am willing to pay a good price for it. Will you take it on?
Well done, man! Here is the reward I promised.
Find %s for Freedom Mechanics
%s are required by Freedom mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Freedom mechanic if you find any.
Yo, hombre. ¿Estás interesado en hacer un trabajo para mí? Necesito herramientas específicas para operar armas.

Yeah dude, we need a bunch of new tools to work with but these jackasses prefer to get high instead of helping us find new replacements. Find a new set of basic tools, then bring it to any Freedom mechanic you can. Can we count on you, man?
Thanks, man! I knew there was a reason we asked you. Te ves como un hombre que puede hacer una mierda. We will give you a discount as a reward.
Find %s for Freedom Mechanics
%s are required by Freedom mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Freedom mechanic if you find any.
Jaja, odio preguntar. Pero realmente podría usar más herramientas. Me trajiste lo que te pedí la última vez, pero necesito un conjunto de mayor calidad. ¿Puedes ayudar de nuevo?
Now we need a new set of advanced tools. If you can bring one, we will all be grateful.
Mantén esta mierda, todos por aquí te van a amar. Gracias hombre. We will offer you better prices from now on as a reward.
Find %s for Freedom Mechanics
%s are required by Freedom mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Freedom mechanic if you find any.
Jaja, odio preguntar. Pero realmente podría usar más herramientas. Me trajiste lo que te pedí la última vez, pero necesito un conjunto de mayor calidad. ¿Puedes ayudar de nuevo?
Now we need a new set of expert tools. That's the last thing we need for now, I promise. If you can bring some back we will be grateful.
Gracias hombre. We will give you a discount as a reward.
Conquista al enemigo
Se te ha encomendado limpiar un área por el bien del todopoderoso Monolito. Informe a Rabbit después de que el trabajo haya terminado.
Tengo una misión importante para ti. Debes viajar a la Zona y despejar el área para que nuestras fuerzas puedan avanzar. ¿Estás listo?
La tarea está hecha? ¡Bueno! Alabado Monolito.
Mata al planificador
A stalker is trying to deactivate the Brain Scorcher. %s from %s ordered you to kill him.
Hay muchas amenazas a las grandes obras de la Zona. Hay uno que una vez más está planeando desactivar el Quemador Cerebral. Él debe ser detenido. Debes encontrarlo y destruirlo.
Lo has hecho bien. El Colectivo está contento.
Find %s for Monolith
%s from %s has requested a new rifle to add to the Monolith arsenal.

Nos volvemos más poderosos todos los días. Necesitamos más armamento para continuar logrando nuestros objetivos. Debes encontrar una nueva arma para nosotros, así podemos continuar haciendo crecer nuestro arsenal.
Encuentra un nuevo %s y tráemelo.
Esto hará bien.
Wild Game Meat
%s from %s ordered you to hunt for and field dress %s.
Nuestras provisiones se agotan. Debes salir a la Zona y buscar carne para que tus hermanos monolitos puedan festejar.
Busca y llevanos %s. Recuerda que estas criaturas son un regalo de la Zona. Mátalos rápidamente y da gracias. Devuélveme la carne cuando hayas tenido éxito.
Has tenido éxito en tu tarea. Bien hecho.
Procure %s for Monolith
%s from %s wants you to procure %s.
Debe procurarnos más suministros para que podamos continuar nuestros grandes trabajos.
Recupera %s y tráemelos.
Has hecho bien en servir a Monolito.
Find the "%s" Artefact for Monolith
%s from %s wants you to find the %s artefact.
We must find another artefact to give as an offering. Will you help serve the good of the Monolith?
Find a "%s" artefact. Bring it to me when you have succeeded so we may conduct the ceremony.
Sirves bien al Monolito. Únete a nosotros esta noche en la ofrenda ceremonial. Habrá canto.
Find %s for Monolith Mechanics
%s are required by Monolith mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Monolith mechanic if you find any.
Necesito que hagas algo por mí. Necesito herramientas específicas para ajustar nuestras armas.
Okay, we need new tools to tune our weapons with better efficiency. Find a new set of basic tools. Go, now.
You've done well. We are giving you a discount as a reward.
Find %s for Monolith Mechanics
%s are required by Monolith mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Monolith mechanic if you find any.
Necesito algunas herramientas más; mejores herramientas. ¿Puedes encontrar lo que pido, otra vez?
We need more tools. Find a new set of advanced tools. Go, now.
¡Bueno! You've brought what we needed. We are giving you a discount as a reward.
Find %s for Monolith Mechanics
%s are required by Monolith mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Monolith mechanic if you find any.
Necesito algunas herramientas más; mejores herramientas. ¿Puedes encontrar lo que pido, otra vez?
We need more tools. Find a new set of expert tools. That should contain what we need for now. Ahora vete.
¡Bueno! You've brought what we needed. We are giving you a discount as a reward.
Escort the Scientists
%s from %s has hired you to guide some researchers to a specific location for study. Una vez que su investigación se haya llevado a cabo con éxito, devuélvalos de forma segura al campamento.
Necesitamos un stalker experimentado para llevar a algunos de nuestros colegas al campo de estudio. ¿Estás listo para la tarea?
Gracias por tu protección, stalker. Por favor, toma esto como muestra de nuestra gratitud.
Find the "%s" Artefact for Ecologists
%s from %s asked you retrieve the %s artefact.
Estamos buscando ciertos tipos de artefactos. Si está interesado, le diré lo que necesitamos.
I need you to bring us back a "%s" artefact. You ever heard of it? We can pay you pretty well in return.
Great! You've found exactly what we are looking for.
Find %s for Ecologists
%s from %s asked you to retrieve a tissue sample from a %s.
Necesito un stalker experimentado o un cazador de mutantes. ¿Es ese alguien tú?
The scientists need to collect tissue samples from a %s. I don't care how you get it, just make sure it's fresh. Get here as soon as you recover what they need from the mutant.
Gracias Señor. This will help immensely in our research.
Find %s for Ecolog Mechanics
%s are required by Ecolog mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Ecolog mechanic if you find any.
Tengo una propuesta para ti. Si puede traerme algunas herramientas nuevas, recibirá un pago. ¿Estás preparado para eso?

Alright. You know where the eggheads turn to when one of their machinery breaks down, right? That's right, to us. Problem is, our tools are getting pretty old and rusty and we are going to need replacements soon. Find some %s for a start. Bring it to any of our mechanics when you get your hands on a set. For each set of tools you bring, we will give you a discount. Do you want to give it a shot?
Tocar el asunto exacto. This is what we've been looking for, thanks!
Find %s for Ecolog Mechanics
%s are required by Ecolog mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Ecolog mechanic if you find any.
Tengo otra proposición. The toolkit you brought me is working out good, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
Now we need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, we need it.
Todo lo que necesito está aquí. Gracias.
Find %s for Ecolog Mechanics
%s are required by Ecolog mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Ecolog mechanic if you find any.
Tengo otra proposición. The toolkit you brought me is working out good, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
Now we need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, we need it.
Todo lo que necesito está aquí. Gracias.
Eliminate Target for Renegades
Find and eliminate the target then return to %s from %s for payment.

Hay muchas personas en la Zona que me han frotado de la manera equivocada o me han mostrado falta de respeto. Algunos de estos pinchazos me deben dinero o jodieron algún trato. Estas personas no son más que ratas que necesitan ser eliminadas. Si está listo para la tarea, le daré su información para que pueda rastrearlos a través del GPS.
Great work! Here's a little something for your trouble:
Eliminate Mutant Threat for Renegades

Se han detectado mutantes cerca de este lugar, lo que hace que el área sea peligrosa. Se te ha encomendado la tarea de eliminar la amenaza de los mutantes dentro del área. Report back to %s in %s after the job is done.

We've been looking for someone with enough balls to clear out mutants in a few places. Stalkers aren't coming around here because they are too afraid. If we don't do something about it we won't have anyone left to 'borrow' any goods from, then we will have to move out of this territory.
Aquí está su pago. I'll make sure to put a good word in for you with the boss.
Eliminate Enemy Threat for Renegades
Se te ha encomendado la tarea de eliminar una amenaza territorial dentro del área. Report back to %s in %s after the job is done.
Las perras se están mudando a nuestro territorio. The boss gave me orders to recruit a low life with enough balls to reclaim some of these camps. ¿Qué dices? ¡Fantástico!
Aquí está su pago. I'll make sure to put a good word in for you with the boss.
Ejecuta un golpe
%s from %s has contracted you to run a hit. Encuentre y elimine el objetivo y luego regrese con él para el pago.
Tengo una lista de personas que me han frotado de la manera equivocada. Quiero que los borres. ¿Qué dices? ¿Qué dices?
Esto es lo que prometí.
Find %s for Renegade Mechanics
%s are required by Renegade mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Renegade mechanic if you find any.
I'm in desperate need of new tools, man. I can't do anything with the rusty shit I have and I'm running out of gun oil. Si está interesado en ayudarme, le diré lo que necesito.

We need better tools, yo. It's pretty fucking hard to search for them when every motherfucker in the Zone is shooting us on sight. For now, we just need a new set of basic tools. You find one, bring it back to any of our mechanics and we will even offer you a discount from here on out. You up for it, dude?
Perfect! This is just what we need, man. I will talk to the other mechanics to give you a discount.
Find %s for Renegade Mechanics
%s are required by Renegade mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Renegade mechanic if you find any.
The toolkit you brought me is great, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
Now we need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, we need it.
Buen trato, amigo, aquí hay algo de dinero. I spoke to the other mechanics to give you an even bigger discount.
Find %s for Renegade Mechanics
%s are required by Renegade mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any Renegade mechanic if you find any.
The toolkit you brought me is great, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
Now we need an %s. That should contain everything we need for now. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, we need it.
You followed through again! Good deal, man, now we have everything we need. We'll give you another discount for your work.
Conquista al enemigo
You have been tasked to clear an area for the cause of the Sinners. Report back after the job is done.
Tengo una misión importante para ti. Debes viajar a la Zona y despejar el área para que nuestras fuerzas puedan avanzar. ¿Estás listo?
La tarea está hecha? ¡Bueno! Praise Sin.
Mata al planificador
A stalker is trying to deactivate the Brain Scorcher. %s from %s ordered you to kill him.
Hay muchas amenazas a las grandes obras de la Zona. Hay uno que una vez más está planeando desactivar el Quemador Cerebral. Él debe ser detenido. Debes encontrarlo y destruirlo.
Lo has hecho bien. El Colectivo está contento.
Find %s for Sin
%s from %s has requested a new rifle to add to the Sinners arsenal.

Nos volvemos más poderosos todos los días. Necesitamos más armamento para continuar logrando nuestros objetivos. Debes encontrar una nueva arma para nosotros, así podemos continuar haciendo crecer nuestro arsenal.
Encuentra un nuevo %s y tráemelo.
Esto hará bien.
Wild Game Meat
%s from %s ordered you to hunt for and field dress %s.
Nuestras provisiones se agotan. You must go out into the Zone and hunt for meat so that your Sin brothers may feast.
Busca y llevanos %s. Recuerda que estas criaturas son un regalo de la Zona. Mátalos rápidamente y da gracias. Devuélveme la carne cuando hayas tenido éxito.
Has tenido éxito en tu tarea. Bien hecho.
Procure %s for Sin
%s from %s wants you to procure %s.
Debe procurarnos más suministros para que podamos continuar nuestros grandes trabajos.
Recupera %s y tráemelos.
You have done well to serve our cause.

%s from %s wants you to find the %s artefact.
We must find another artefact to give as an offering. Will you help serve the good of the Sinners?
Find a "%s" artefact. Bring it to me when you have succeeded so we may conduct the ceremony.
You serve our cause well. Únete a nosotros esta noche en la ofrenda ceremonial. Habrá canto.

Find %s for UNISG Mechanics
%s are required by UNISG mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any UNISG mechanic if you find any.
Tengo una propuesta para ti. Si puede traerme algunas herramientas nuevas, recibirá un pago. ¿Estás preparado para eso?

¡Bueno! We've been looking all over for a %s. It should contain some oil and tools that we need to do work on firearms. We will pay you for one of these toolkits if you can bring a full set back to any of our mechanics, including me. For every new set of tools you bring, we will reduce the prices for our services as a token of our gratitude. So, what do you say? You gonna help us?.
Tocar el asunto exacto. This is what we've been looking for, thanks!
Find %s for UNISG Mechanics
%s are required by UNISG mechanics to replace the old ones, you should bring them back to any UNISG mechanic if you find any.
Tengo otra proposición. The toolkit you brought me is working out good, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
Now we need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, we need it.
Todo lo que necesito está aquí. Gracias.
